issues.description: Hero CTA standardization may reduce urgency and conversion if primary action becomes unclear
issues.rationale: Two CTAs create decision paralysis; secondary option may dilute primary conversion intent

issues.description: Sticky CTA only on mobile creates desktop conversion gap after 40% scroll depth
issues.rationale: Desktop users lose CTA access during long scrolls, creating conversion abandonment points

issues.description: Proof bar placement may interrupt hero momentum before value proposition is established
issues.rationale: Trust elements before clear value understanding can feel premature and reduce credibility

issues.description: Section reordering buries pricing too deep in funnel, increasing drop-off before price reveal
issues.rationale: Users need pricing context earlier to qualify themselves and reduce sticker shock

issues.description: Audit log pattern may overwhelm users with technical complexity before establishing need
issues.rationale: 8-12 rows of technical data can intimidate non-technical users and hurt comprehension

issues.description: How it works stepper may increase cognitive load with process complexity visualization
issues.rationale: 3-step process may feel overwhelming; users prefer simple one-click solutions

issues.description: 16px body text with 65ch line length may reduce mobile readability on smaller screens
issues.rationale: Long line lengths on mobile create scanning fatigue and reduce comprehension speed

issues.description: 8px border radius may feel too sharp for trust-focused brand positioning
issues.rationale: Sharper corners can subconsciously signal rigidity rather than approachable safety

issues.description: Card elevation and shadows may create visual noise that distracts from content hierarchy
issues.rationale: Multiple elevated elements compete for attention and reduce focus on primary actions

issues.description: Proof chips with light background may lack visual weight to establish credibility effectively
issues.rationale: Subtle styling may make trust indicators appear less important than they are

suggestedFixes.fix: Use single primary CTA (48px height) with secondary link below (24px spacing) to reduce decision friction
suggestedFixes.rationale: Clear hierarchy eliminates choice paralysis while maintaining fallback option

suggestedFixes.fix: Add sticky CTA for both mobile (56px) and desktop (48px) after 30% scroll to maintain conversion path
suggestedFixes.rationale: Consistent CTA availability across devices prevents conversion abandonment

suggestedFixes.fix: Move proof bar after problem/solution section (80px spacing) to reinforce value before trust claims
suggestedFixes.rationale: Trust elements work better after users understand the problem and solution fit

suggestedFixes.fix: Reorder to: Hero → Problem/Solution → Pricing preview → How it works → Full suite → Audit log
suggestedFixes.rationale: Earlier pricing context helps users self-qualify and reduces abandonment

suggestedFixes.fix: Reduce to 4-5 log entries with clear labels and add 'View sample' expandable section
suggestedFixes.rationale: Simplified preview with optional detail reduces overwhelm while maintaining transparency

suggestedFixes.fix: Simplify to 2-step process: 'Connect' and 'Launch' with 40px icons and 24px spacing
suggestedFixes.rationale: Fewer steps reduce perceived complexity and increase confidence in ease of use

suggestedFixes.fix: Use 16px body with 55ch max width on desktop, 45ch on mobile for optimal readability
suggestedFixes.rationale: Shorter line lengths improve scanning speed and comprehension on all devices

suggestedFixes.fix: Increase to 12px border radius for softer, more approachable feel aligned with trust positioning
suggestedFixes.rationale: Rounder corners create psychological safety and approachability for business users

suggestedFixes.fix: Use single subtle shadow (0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.08)) and 16px padding for cleaner hierarchy
suggestedFixes.rationale: Minimal elevation reduces visual competition while maintaining content grouping

suggestedFixes.fix: Add subtle border (1px neutral-300) and increase padding to 16px for stronger visual presence
suggestedFixes.rationale: Enhanced visual weight makes trust indicators more prominent and credible
